thread.section_title: MyMusicFolders.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyMusicFolders.com | mymusicfolders.com | 2 of 37
thread.title: Derryl

author: Derryl
title: Derryl
text:
My old folder wore out after 9 years. When I got the new folder, the name was misspelled (but the account and shaping name was spelled correctly). I called and was told would ship a no charge replacement. When I got the new invoice after the call, the name was still misspelled, but got corrected with a call a few minutes later. The replacement is just what i wanted.
People seeing my folder has prompted others to order the same folder.
